settings.title_faqs: Can I pay off my purchase early?
settings.answere:
Yes—you’re welcome to pay off your NVY financing early at any time. There are no fees or penalties for early repayment.

For details on your payment schedule or to make a change, please contact Affirm directly or log into your Affirm account.

settings.title_faqs: How do I make my payments?
settings.answere:
You can make or schedule payments through Affirm.com or in the Affirm app for iOS and Android. Affirm will also send you email and text reminders before each payment is due, so you’re always in the loop.

For account access, payment options, or support, visit Affirm’s Help Center or contact them directly.

settings.title_faqs: Does checking my eligibility affect my credit score?
settings.answere:
No—checking your eligibility with Affirm will not impact your credit score. It’s a soft inquiry, which means you can explore your financing options with confidence and no effect on your credit.

For more details, visit Affirm.com or reach out to our Concierge Team for assistance.

settings.title_faqs: Can I return an item I purchased with Affirm?
settings.answere:
Yes—you can return an item purchased with Affirm by initiating the return directly with NVY. Once your return is approved and processed, the refund will be applied to your Affirm account.

Please note: While NVY handles the return, Affirm manages your payment schedule, so continue making payments until your refund is confirmed.

Need help with a return? Contact our Support Team at support@nvyusa.com or call (305) 928-8734.

settings.title_faqs: Do I need a mobile number to use Affirm?
settings.answere:
Yes—to use Affirm, you’ll need a valid U.S. mobile phone number. This helps Affirm securely verify your identity when creating an account or signing in.

For more details or support with your Affirm account, visit Affirm.com or use the Affirm app on iOS or Android.

settings.title_faqs: Where can I learn more about Affirm?
settings.answere:
To explore financing options, account details, or support resources, visit Affirm.com. Their site offers everything you need to manage your payments, check eligibility, and get answers to common questions.

For help with NVY orders financed through Affirm, our Support Team is also here to assist at support@nvyusa.com.
